Hi,

I would like to know if we have Paging feature available for DataGrid control in the new release (Mar 2009) of WPFToolkit?

Vipul Mehta

Hi Vipul,

No, we haven't added any new features to DataGrid in the March release, just bug fixes.

Thanks,
Samantha

Hi Samantha,

Do you have any plans to incorporate the Paging functionality in any of your future releases?

 Regards,
  Vipul

Hi Vipul,

We would like to include paging, but this is a long-term plan and probably won't be available for at least a year or more.  My recommendation would be to find an alternate implementation (like the one suggested by totolwang above) if you need this feature anytime soon.

Thanks!
Samantha
